00018 SpectrumMaker::SpectrumMaker(const std::string& name) : 
00019   BaseModule(name, "Histogram variables from data") ,
00020   _histo(0), _canvas(0), _tree(0), _branch(0), _xform(0), _yform(0), _cutform(0)
00021 {
00022   RegisterParameter("xvar", _xvar = "", "Variable to plot on x axis");
00023   RegisterParameter("nbinsx",_nbinsx = 200, "Number of bins in the x axis");
00024   RegisterParameter("xmin", _xmin = 0, "Minimum x range of the histogram");
00025   RegisterParameter("xmax", _xmax = 0, "Maximum x range of the histogram");
00026   
00027   RegisterParameter("yvar", _yvar = "", "Variable to plot on y axis");
00028   RegisterParameter("nbinsy",_nbinsy = 200, "Number of bins in the y axis");
00029   RegisterParameter("ymin", _ymin = 0, "Minimum y range of the histogram");
00030   RegisterParameter("ymax", _ymax = 0, "Maximum y range of the histogram");
00031   
00032   RegisterParameter("cut", _cut = "", "Cut to test before drawing");
00033   RegisterParameter("title", _title="", "Title for the histogram");
00034   RegisterParameter("xtitle", _xtitle="", "Title for the x axis");
00035   RegisterParameter("ytitle", _ytitle="", "Title of the yaxis");
00036   RegisterParameter("logx", _logx = false, "Plot on logarythmic x axis?");
00037   RegisterParameter("logy", _logy = false, "Plot on logarythmic y axis?");
00038   
00039 }
00040 
00041 SpectrumMaker::~SpectrumMaker()
00042 {
00043   Finalize();
00044 }
00045   
00046 int SpectrumMaker::Initialize()
00047 {
00048   if(_xvar == "" || _nbinsx == 0 || _xmin == _xmax || 
00049      (_yvar != "" && (_nbinsy==0 || _ymin == _ymax)) ){
00050     //can't do anything
00051     Message(ERROR)<<"Incorrect axis or variable specifications for "
00052                   <<GetName()<<"; disabling.\n";
00053     return 1;
00054   }
00055   
00056   RootGraphix* graphix = EventHandler::GetInstance()->GetModule<RootGraphix>();
00057   
00058   if(_yvar == ""){
00059     _histo = new TH1D(GetName().c_str(), _title.c_str(),
00060                       _nbinsx, _xmin, _xmax);
00061     _histo->SetFillColor(kGreen);
00062   }
00063   else
00064     _histo = new TH2D(GetName().c_str(), _title.c_str(),
00065                       _nbinsx, _xmin, _xmax,
00066                       _nbinsy, _ymin, _ymax);
00067   _histo->SetXTitle(_xtitle.c_str());
00068   _histo->SetYTitle(_ytitle.c_str());
00069   
00070   if(graphix && graphix->enabled){
00071     _canvas = graphix->GetCanvas(GetName().c_str());
00072     _canvas->SetLogy(_logy);
00073     _canvas->SetLogx(_logx);
00074     _canvas->cd();
00075     _histo->Draw( _yvar.empty() ? "" : "colz");
00076   }
00077   
00078   _tree = new TTree((GetName()+"tree").c_str(),"");
00079   EventData* ptr = new EventData;
00080   _branch = _tree->Branch(EventData::GetBranchName(),&ptr);
00081   _tree->SetEntries(1);
00082   delete ptr;
00083   
00084   _xform = new TTreeFormula((GetName()+"xform").c_str(),_xvar.c_str(),_tree);
00085   _xform->SetQuickLoad(true);
00086   if(!_yvar.empty()){
00087     _yform = new TTreeFormula((GetName()+"yform").c_str(),_yvar.c_str(),_tree);
00088     _yform->SetQuickLoad(true);
00089   }
00090   
00091   if(!_cut.empty()){
00092     _cutform = new TTreeFormula((GetName()+"cutform").c_str(),_cut.c_str(),
00093                                 _tree);
00094     _cutform->SetQuickLoad(true);
00095   }
00096   
00097        
00098   
00099   _draw_cmd = _yvar;
00100   if(!_yvar.empty())
00101     _draw_cmd += " : ";
00102   _draw_cmd += _xvar;
00103   
00104   _draw_cmd += " >>+";
00105   _draw_cmd += _histo->GetName();
00106   return 0;
00107 }
00108 
00109 int SpectrumMaker::Finalize()
00110 {
00111   if( gFile && gFile->IsOpen() && _histo)
00112     _histo->Write();
00113   if(_histo) delete _histo;
00114   _histo = 0;
00115   // RootGraphix will delete the canvas
00116   _canvas = 0;
00117   delete _tree;
00118   _tree = 0;
00119   _branch = 0;
00120   delete _xform;
00121   _xform = 0;
00122   delete _yform;
00123   _yform = 0;
00124   delete _cutform;
00125   _cutform = 0;
00126   return 0;
00127 }
00128 
00129 int SpectrumMaker::Process(EventPtr evt)
00130 {
00131   EventDataPtr data = evt->GetEventData();
00132   EventData* ptr = data.get();
00133   _branch->SetAddress( &ptr );
00134   //_tree->Draw(_draw_cmd.c_str(), _cut.c_str(),"goff");
00135   for(int i=0; i<_xform->GetNdata(); ++i){
00136     if(_cutform){
00137       if(_cutform->GetNdata() <= i)
00138         break;
00139       if(_cutform->EvalInstance(i)==0)
00140         continue;
00141     }
00142     double xval = _xform->EvalInstance(i);
00143     if(_yform){
00144       if(_yform->GetNdata() <= i)
00145         break;
00146       double yval = _yform->EvalInstance(i);
00147       ((TH2D*)(_histo))->Fill(xval,yval);
00148     }
00149     else
00150       _histo->Fill(xval);
00151   }
00152   
00153   
00154   if(_canvas)
00155     _canvas->Modified();
00156   return 0;
00157 }
